amendment.description: To extend by 15 months the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program of the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S279; text: CR S279) To extend by 15 months the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program of the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
